Botticelli

Checklist for Unisex Bathroom

  1. Top up hand towels (Placed on the bottom of the left hand side cupboard)
  2. Top up Toilet paper in the basket (Placed on the top cupboard where the ladies toilet on the other side)
  3. Top up Tissues (Placed on the top of the black cupboard in Sorrento Room where the cushions are.
  4. Make sure the baby chairs are clean (There is a cloth/chux and Spray and wipe on the bottom of the left hand side white cupboard.
  5. Take rubbish out
